data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Alvaro Doria Dos, Onody, Helena Carolina, Brandão, Carlos Roberto Ferreira (2019): Taxonomic contributions to the genus Charops Holmgren, 1859 (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae), with description of seven new species from Brazil. Zootaxa 4619 (1): 45-76, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4619.1.2|255 occurrences
